facts.relationship: First paternal cousin of the victim

injuries: Lacerated wound on right cheek with skull and bone fractures

prosecution_story.motive: Dispute over expenses and involvement in an abduction case
sequence_of_events: Appellant demanded expenses from the victim
Appellant shot the victim twice, leading to death
Appellant apprehended at the scene by witnesses

defense_story.denial_of_charge: Appellant denied involvement in the murder
defense_story.allegation: Claimed false implication due to enmity with Yusaf

defense_witnesses.name: Mst. Imam Sain
defense_witnesses.relationship: Sister of the deceased, married to appellant's brother

defense_witnesses.name: Hassan
defense_witnesses.testimony: Claimed no identification of the assailant

issues.arrest_date_discrepancy: Confusion over arrest date in police remand application
issues.failure_to_send_evidence: Empty cartridges not sent to Ballistics Expert

court_findings.witness_credibility: Prosecution witnesses deemed credible despite being relatives
court_findings.defense_witness_rejection: Defense witnesses found influenced by appellant's relatives
court_findings.provocation: Possibility of provocation during altercation acknowledged
